text: You simply must tell me where you got this. I love "Crystal Sea", which this arrangement/instrumental version is based on.
author: TornadoWhirl33

text: This song could fit well into the Animal Crossing stage in SSB4 3ds.
author: Wesley Harrison

text: SupraDarky  you are a "complete throwback" to when blogging online with cool people with cool ideas and good conversation man! Keep doing your thing with the music alot of people look forward to hearing the gaming music you post and I for one am one of them!!  -TheOldskool2009
author: TheOldskool2009

text: Would love to see a change on the owners of this franchise. Imagine Nintendo somehow getting the rights for this franchise and starting to produce epic super ball monkey games. How awesome would that be? I know some will say "Why don't you just buy one of their games?" I want Nintendo to develop a game for this franchise because I think that if Nintendo touches a game, it is always magic.
author: Giovanni

text: Or maybe a super monkey ball game that follows the roots of Mario & Luigi Dream Team to have the ability to go to MeeMee's dreams.
author: Wesley Harrison

text: I remember burning my thumbs off at the DS game in the franchise with my sister. Good painful times.
author: Jirt

text: Nice summer tune to kick off my favorite months of the year (June-September). We've had some pretty terrible weather this year so far here in Montreal, hopefully we get a good summer. I haven't tried most of the games in this series, but what I've played was pure, simple fun mixed with some frustration when you keep failing! The music's always solid as well.
author: SupraDarky

text: I have only played the original on the Gamecube and it was pretty fun,  The same day i played, I also got to play a bit of multiplayer from Kirby Air Ride which was also fun.  I might try to listen to the music from this series sometime soon.  Also Gabe, what are your thoughts on Dust: An Elysian Tale so far?
author: Eric C.

text: It's summer again and this is perfect!
author: Hannah Sloat
